Module JavaProject
Package restaurant.controller

Class PromoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • restaurant.controller.AbstractController<Menu>
      • restaurant.controller.MenuController
        • restaurant.controller.PromoController
  • public class PromoController
extends MenuController

    Business logic pertaining to promotions. It involves the create, read, update and delete functionalities.

    Inherits MenuController

    Author:
    Muhaimin
